name: elprob
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, cprb), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cdm(c0))), nat1)))

stmt.origin: elrab2(hs0, c0, cprb, cuni(crn(cmeas)), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cdm(c0))), nat1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))), nat1))
stmt.pretty: elrab2(hs0, c0, cprb, ⋃ ran(measures), (c0 ` ⋃ dom(c0))= 1, (hs0 ` ⋃ dom(hs0))= 1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cprb), wa(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cmeas))), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cdm(c0))), nat1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))), nat1), wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cdm(c0))), nat1)))
-| wceq(cprb, crab(hs0, cuni(crn(cmeas)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))), nat1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, cuni(crn(cmeas)))
-| diffsw(hs0, wceq(cfv(c0, cuni(cdm(c0))), nat1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Prob ↔(c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(measures)∧(c0 ` ⋃ dom(c0))= 1))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((hs0 ` ⋃ dom(hs0))= 1 ↔(c0 ` ⋃ dom(c0))= 1))
⊣ Prob = { hs0 ∈ ⋃ ran(measures)|(hs0 ` ⋃ dom(hs0))= 1 }
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, ⋃ ran(measures))
⊣ d(hs0,(c0 ` ⋃ dom(c0))= 1)
